file_insights.changes: Added comprehensive VPS hosting comparison section

patterns_discovered: Systematic comparison of cloud hosting options
Setup instructions for multiple cloud providers
gotchas_discovered: Free tier VMs often too small for production workloads
ARM architecture requires compatible Docker images
Cloud provider free tiers have time or resource limitations
recommendations: Use Hetzner CX32 for production deployments
Consider Oracle Cloud ARM for development/testing
Always check Docker image compatibility with host architecture
Plan for potential scaling beyond free tier limitations
